info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 12:48PM MDT until July 01 at 1:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lewis and Clark County in west central Montana... Broadwater County in southwestern Montana... Meagher County in central Montana... Northeastern Jefferson County in southwestern Montana... Southeastern Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 115 PM MDT. * At 1247 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles southeast of Wolf Creek to 9 miles east of East Helena to 11 miles west of Townsend, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Townsend, White Sulphur Springs, Neihart, Fort Logan On The Smith River, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Winston, York, Monarch, Ringling, Silos, Fort Logan and Goose Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
